Businesses and their employees must wear masks indoors and follow measures implemented by each business, or a 150,000 dinar fine will be given to owners. Entry of foreign nationals who have been vaccinated or recovered outside of Israel    Vaccinated or recovered foreign nationals can enter Israel via Ben Gurion International Airport if:  They have not visited a country on the red list in the last 14 days before arrival in Israel;  They have received a vaccine approved by the World Health Organization (WHO), or they have recovered in accordance with protocol set by Israel, as specified below.
